detail_desc: Set with a hat and tube scarf in soft jersey.
Cardigan knitted in a cotton blend with a lightly brushed finish. Shawl collar, diagonal zip down the front, dropped shoulders, extra- long sleeves and an asymmetric hem.

Ankle-length, off-the-shoulder dress in soft viscose jersey with elastication and a second layer of fabric at the top with short sleeves. Elasticated seam at the at the waist and a long slit at the hem.
Fine-knit socks in a cotton blend with soft terry inside.
Bras in cotton jersey with underwired, padded cups that shape the bust and provide extra-firm support. Wide, adjustable shoulder straps and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back.
Hat in a linen and cotton blend with a contrasting colour band. Lined. Width of brim 3 cm.

Playsuit in soft, washed viscose twill with a V-neck, wrapover front and short sleeves with inset ladder stitching. Concealed zip at the back, an elasticated seam and detachable ties at the waist, and side pockets.
Fine-knit mittens decorated with plastic beads. Flap at the front that can be fastened back with a button to reveal a pair of fingerless gloves.
Wide, straight-cut dress in cotton jersey with dropped shoulders, short sleeves and a seam and wide flounce at the hem.
Long-sleeved top with an appliqué on the front, a round neck with a press-stud on one shoulder, and ribbing around the neckline and cuffs. Straight-cut hem with slits in the sides.

Slim-fit jeans in different colours of washed, superstretch, flexible denim for maximum mobility. Adjustable, elasticated waist (in sizes 8-12Y), zip fly and button, fake front pockets, real back pockets and narrow hems.
Tights with an elasticated waist. 40 denier.
Ankle-length trousers in a jacquard-weave viscose blend with a high waist and wide, detachable belt. Concealed zip in the side, side pockets and slightly shorter, tapered legs with creases.
Brazilian briefs in microfibre with lace trims. Low waist, lined gusset and a high cut at the back.

Padded jacket in windproof, water-repellent, breathable functional fabric with folded seams and reflective details. Detachable, lined hood, a stand-up collar and a zip down the front with a chin guard. Zipped front pockets, and soft fleece inner ribbing and a tab with an adjustable hook and loop fastening at the cuffs. Rounded and slightly longer at the back. Fleece lining. The jacket has a water-repellent coating without fluorocarbons.
Fitted mesh top with long sleeves.
Sleeveless playsuit in soft, printed jersey. Seam with concealed elastication at the waist and short ties at the front, and short legs.
Sleeveless, fitted, calf-length dress in jersey crêpe with draping at one side. V-neck, narrow shoulder straps, a sewn-in wrapover at the front, and an asymmetric hem with a slit in one side.

Coat in woven fabric with a soft, brushed finish. Notch lapels and a wrapover front with concealed press-studs and a detachable tie belt at the waist. Discreet side pockets and a single back vent. Satin lining. The polyester content of the coat’s lining is partly recycled.
Sleeveless dress in airy chiffon with an elasticated seam at the waist and a gently flared skirt with an asymmetric hem. Jersey lining.

Nylon windbreaker with a mesh-lined drawstring hood, zip down the front, zipped chest pocket, side pockets and an inner pocket. Long sleeves with elasticated cuffs and an elastic drawstring at the hem. Mesh lining.
Ankle-length dress in soft jersey with a round, slightly wider neckline and wide shoulder straps. Relaxed fit with gathered tiers for added width and soft draping. Unlined.
Pyjamas in a printed cotton blend. Short-sleeved top with a round neck. Bottoms with an elasticated waist and wide, tapered legs with ribbed hems.
Calf-length dress in soft viscose with a sheen. Narrow, adjustable shoulder straps and high slits in the sides. Unlined.
Fully lined swimsuit with a V-neck, ties at the back of the neck, an open back and wide, sewn-on ties at the front of the waist.
Shorts in cotton twill with an adjustable elasticated waist, fly with a button, fake front pockets and a fake back pocket.
Socks in a soft, fine-knit cotton blend with a fold-down shaft and soft terry inside. Sizes 3-9 with anti-slip protectors.
Shorts in cotton twill with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets and an open back pocket.
Top in block-coloured sweatshirt fabric with a lined drawstring hood with a wrapover front. Kangaroo pocket and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Fitted T-shirt in stretch, ribbed organic cotton jersey.
Shorts in washed stretch denim with worn details and concealed, adjustable elastication at the waist. Zip fly and press-stud, fake front pockets, real back pockets and embroidered hems.
Dress in soft cotton jersey with a reversible sequin motif on the front (sizes 1½-3Y with normal sequins), short, flounced sleeves, a gathered seam at the waist and a gently flared skirt.
Chelsea boots with elastic gores in the sides and a loop at the back. Fabric linings and insoles and chunky soles. Heel 3.5 cm.
Knitted cashmere scarf with ribbing on the short sides. Size 50x170 cm.
Top in sweatshirt fabric with a motif in a relaxed fit with long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Ankle-length leather trousers with a high waist, concealed zip in one side and tapered legs with decorative seams.
Pyjamas with a long-sleeved jersey top and soft cotton flannel bottoms. Top with a print motif on the front and ribbing at the cuffs. Bottoms with an elasticated waist.

Short, fitted dress in stretch fabric with a deep V-neck front and back and a horizontal strap at the back of the neck. Long sleeves and gathered seams for a draped effect front and back. Partly lined in jersey.
Lace bikini briefs with a low waist, lined gusset and cutaway coverage at the back.
Shorts in viscose twill with decorative zips, an elasticated, drawstring waist and side pockets.
5-pocket jeans in washed stretch denim with a regular waist, zip fly and button at the waist, and skinny legs.
5-pocket shorts in washed stretch denim with a high, adjustable elasticated waist, zip fly and button and raw-edge, frayed hems.

Shirt in airy end-on-end cotton with a button-down collar, classic front and open chest pocket. Long sleeves with adjustable buttoning at the cuffs, a yoke with a pleat and hanger at the back, and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back. Regular fit – a classic fit with good room for movement and a gently tapered waist to create a comfortable, tailored silhouette.
Short top in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with a print motif on the front, dropped shoulders and long sleeves. Ribbing around the neckline and cuffs, and ties at the hem.
V-neck blouse in woven fabric with short raglan sleeves, decorative gathers at the neckline and buttons down the front.
Jumper in a soft, fine knit containing some wool with gently dropped shoulders, long sleeves, ribbing around the neckline and cuffs and hem, and short slits in the sides.
Jumper in a soft cotton knit with dropped shoulders, long sleeves, a zipped chest pocket in woven fabric, and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Suede ankle boots with a zip in one side and covered heels. Satin linings, leather insoles and rubber soles. Heel 10 cm.
Calf-length, fitted slip dress in jersey with a sheen. Narrow adjustable shoulder straps and a slit in one side. Unlined.
Knee-length shorts in washed cotton twill with an adjustable, elasticated waist, zip fly and button, diagonal side pockets and a fake welt back pocket.

Shirt in a premium cotton weave with a grandad collar with a tab at the front, French front and yoke at the back. Long sleeves with adjustable buttoning at the cuffs, and a rounded hem. Regular fit – a classic fit with good room for movement and a gently tapered waist to create a comfortable, tailored silhouette.
Tops in soft cotton jersey with a racer back and elastic hem.
Cropped, V-neck bralette top with draped cups, narrow, adjustable shoulder straps and smocking at the back. Lined.

Sandals in patterned ethylene-vinyl acetate with a small loop at the back and straps with hook and loop fasteners. Lined in jersey made from recycled polyester. Moulded insoles with a textured pattern to give the feet a better grip, and patterned soles.
Short swim shorts in woven fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist. Soft mesh inner shorts.
Shirt in cotton poplin with a grandad collar, chest pocket, buttons down the front, short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups, and a rounded hem.
Pyjamas in soft cotton jersey. Short-sleeved top with a print motif on the front and a lace trim at the sleeve-ends and hem. Short shorts with an elasticated waist and lace-trimmed hems.
Imitation leather trainers with a lightly padded top edge, elasticated lacing and a hook and loop tab at the front. Contrasting colour heel caps and mesh linings and insoles.
Brogues with a decorative welt seam around the soles, lacing at the front and a loop at the back. Canvas linings and insoles and patterned soles.
Pyjamas with a T-shirt and shorts in cotton jersey. T-shirt with a motif on the chest. Patterned shorts with an elasticated waist, side pockets and fake fly.
Skirt in a soft jacquard knit with an elasticated, ribbed waist and ribbed hem.
Cardigan in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with visible seams, a jersey-lined, drawstring hood, long sleeves and side pockets. Asymmetric hem with a raw, roll edge. No fasteners.
Ankle-length, pleated jersey trousers with an elasticated waist and raw-edge hems.

Short dress in an airy, crinkled cotton weave with a slightly wider, gathered neckline and an opening at the front with narrow ties. Long raglan sleeves with narrow elastication and a frill at the cuffs, a smocked seam at the waist and a softly draping, double-layered skirt.
Oversized top in sturdy cotton jersey with a print motif on the chest and back, a ribbed neckline, dropped shoulders and long sleeves.
Long-sleeved dress in a short, fitted style.
Boxer briefs in soft, printed cotton jersey with an elasticated waist and lined gusset.
Jumper in a soft, loose-knit wool blend with low dropped shoulders and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.

Push-up bralette in lace with decorative lacing at the front and moulded, padded cups for light lift and a fuller cleavage. Narrow adjustable shoulder straps, a wide lace trim at the hem and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back.
Three-strand neckline of thin metal chains decorated with small plastic beads and round pendants. Adjustable length, 45-53 cm.

Outdoor jacket with light padding front and back in woven fabric and a lined hood. Zip down the front, zipped side pockets and long raglan sleeves with thumbholes at the cuffs. Lightly brushed thermal lining in the sleeves and sides. Partly lined.
Jacket in sweatshirt fabric with a lined drawstring hood, zip down the front, side pockets and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Regular fit.
Straight-cut T-shirt in a relaxed fit made from airy linen jersey.
Soft, non-wired bras in microfibre with padded cups that shape the bust and provide good support. Adjustable shoulder straps and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back.
Scarf in a soft wool weave containing some cashmere with fringes on the short sides.
Leggings in soft cotton jersey with covered elastication at the waist.
Long-sleeved dress in soft cotton jersey with a round neckline, concealed press-stud on one shoulder, seam at the waist and flared skirt.
Hairband with a knot detail at the front and covered elastic at the back.
Shopper in braided paper straw with a fringed top edge and two imitation leather handles. Unlined. Depth 14 cm. Height 33 cm. Width 45 cm.
Jumper in a soft rib knit containing some wool with long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. The polyester content of the jumper is recycled.
